remarks: Value of the constructor of the set of all constant polynomial matrices, i.e. the set of all ` N ` x ` N ` matrices of polynomials over a ring ` R ` .  (Contributed by AV, 15-Nov-2019.)
statement:
cpmat.s $e |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) $.
cpmat.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
cpmat.c $e |- C = ( N Mat P ) $.
cpmat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
cpmat $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> S = { m e. B | A. i e. N A. j e. N A. k e. NN ( ( coe1 ` ( i m j ) ) ` k ) = ( 0g ` R ) } ) $.
$d B m $.
$d N i j k m $.
$d R i j k m $.
